name: Dreaming Worlds - DEMO
description:
Gameplay Demo for Dreaming Worlds. A 3rd-person puzzle-platformer game about a dreaming red panda and its journey in the dream worlds. Made by wolfftertainment

Help me with the development of this solo project and tell me what you liked and what I should change!

Play as a dreaming red panda that has to rescue the Dreaming Worlds from a mysterious corruption. 

Get in contact with the other Dreamguardians and explore their dreams!

Find the reason for the corruption!

A mysterious voice will guide you through your own dream and lead you into the dream of Leyfin - The blue elephant that is also the guardian of dreams of curiosity! She got trapped in her dreams because of the same purple corruption that encased yourself in your dream. Jump and puzzle your way to her! Maybe you will find out more?
